content.question: The building shown is similar to Chartres Cathedral, in that both structures feature

choices.label: a stained-glass window showing the Virgin Mary
the use of different colored stone to create decorative effects
the exclusive use of aniconic sculptural reliefs
a cruciform plan comprised of a nave and transept

content.answer: a cruciform plan comprised of a nave and transept

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
